LABEL: 0x396
STRING: As soon as I take my seat in the classroom, Nana comes over to me.

LABEL: 0x57E
STRING: ...What happened? You look really down today. Did something bad happen to you?

LABEL: 0x6A9
STRING: "Metarou, h-hey... there's something I want to talk to you about."

LABEL: 0x84A
STRING: "And, you can't tell anyone... no one else, got it?"

LABEL: 0x936
STRING: Yeah, of course. I'm always on your side.

LABEL: 0xBD0
STRING: "Lately, I feel like someone's been following me all the time."

LABEL: 0xCC8
STRING: What the hell. Isn't that a stalker then?

LABEL: 0xDD7
STRING: "...Yeah, about that. Well, I have an idea of who it is but..."

LABEL: 0xEC9
STRING: I'm stuck. What should I do in a situation like this...?

LABEL: 0xF21
STRING: The first time dealing with something like that is especially troublesome. If you make a bad move, it can become dangerous...

LIST.STRING: I'll wait for you until you finish your job.

LABEL: 0xFE2
STRING: For the time being, I decided to wait for her since she had to go to her part-time job today.

LABEL: 0x1051
STRING: Then if I walk her home at night, she'll be safe, at least for a while.

LABEL: 0x116C
STRING: "Really? Thank you... that's such a relief. I will feel so much safer with you..."

LABEL: 0x1276
STRING: Still, what has made Nana, who has a mental toughness like steel, so frightened?

LABEL: 0x155D
STRING: "It's strange! Saiko-chan... there's definitely something off about her!"

LABEL: 0x1653
STRING: Nana's hands were shaking, and her face was pale.

LABEL: 0x16AA
STRING: Just what in the world had happened...!?

LABEL: 0x17A9
STRING: "Didn't we go on a date to a theme park last week?"

LABEL: 0x193E
STRING: "You know, when we went, it just so happened that there was a one-day anniversary event..."

LABEL: 0x1B29
STRING: "This bunny and chick strap is only available at that event, and only on that one day!"

LABEL: 0x1CEC
STRING: "You saw it too, didn't you? It was on Saiko's flip phone, and she said that she bought it because it happened to be the same as mine..."

LABEL: 0x1EC3
STRING: "So... on that day, when I bought this, Saiko-chan was watching us all along...!?"

LABEL: 0x2080
STRING: "How long has she been behind our backs, following us...?!"

LABEL: 0x2227
STRING: "What should I do, I'm... I'm sure that girl is stalking me!"

LABEL: 0x23D0
STRING: "Help me, Metarou... I'm scared! I might get killed for real..."

LABEL: 0x2583
STRING: "I can't say anything, because I'm afraid that if I push her away now, she might do something... in retaliation."

LABEL: 0x275A
STRING: "I finally landed this great part-time job, and I don't want to quit..."

LABEL: 0x2858
STRING: I thought she was exaggerating a bit, but then, if something happened, then it'd be already too late.

LABEL: 0x28CB
STRING: Since she liked her work, and since I saw her trying her best, it would be hard to tell her to quit.

LABEL: 0x2A06
STRING: "And somehow, it's kinda like... I'm looking at myself when I was little..."

LABEL: 0x2BA9
STRING: "I'm... not Saiko-chan... right? I'm different, right?"

LABEL: 0x2E1B
STRING: I grabbed Nana's shoulders as her eyes wavered, and called her back to her senses.

LABEL: 0x30EB
STRING: "Oh, thanks, I've been feeling kinda off lately... Sometimes it feels like my head's spinning."

LABEL: 0x31FE
STRING: Nana, who had been agitated up till now, managed to regain her composure and took a seat.

LABEL: 0x326F
STRING: ...I'm worried about you, I hope you don't collapse during class.

LABEL: 0x35BE
STRING: Class is over, and I walked Nana to her workplace. And then, I found a good place to kill time in.

LABEL: 0x3633
STRING: Time flew by as I browsed at a nearby used bookstore and enjoyed a cup of coffee at a coffee shop.

LABEL: 0x36CC
STRING: And so, it's almost time for Nana's part-time job to end today.

LABEL: 0x3779
STRING: I was told to wait in front of the back door of the restaurant, so I decided to wait at the designated spot.

LABEL: 0x37EC
STRING: ...But, there was someone already there. Apparently a customer had arrived before me.

LABEL: 0x389A
STRING: The moment I caught sight of her, I stopped dead in my tracks.

LABEL: 0x39E7
STRING: Don't tell me she's... waiting for Nana? It can't be, right? There's no way.

LABEL: 0x3A4A
STRING: Casually, I imitated her and leaned against the wall.

LABEL: 0x3AAB
STRING: I glanced at her, but she didn't show any reaction.

LABEL: 0x3B02
STRING: Maybe she didn't even notice I'd arrived...

LABEL: 0x3BA8
STRING: The very person that Nana's afraid of is here right now.

LABEL: 0x3BFF
STRING: If she stays here, she'll run into Nana after she finishes her part-time job.

LABEL: 0x3C7C
STRING: What should I do? Suppose I try to drive her out from here.

LABEL: 0x3CDD
STRING: I'm afraid that if I were to make a poor impression on this mysterious girl, my life would be in jeopardy.

LABEL: 0x3DFB
STRING: I felt Saiko speak and turned to her, only to find her mouth slightly agape.

LABEL: 0x3EDD
STRING: What do you mean, who...? I introduced myself to you at the restaurant the other day, don't you remember?

LABEL: 0x3F4A
STRING: First of all, since you asked, I'll tell you my name.

LABEL: 0x404E
STRING: The corners of her narrow lips lifted slightly.

LABEL: 0x415A
STRING: That flashed through my mind for a second, but for the time being I'll humour you with a reply.

LABEL: 0x429C
STRING: "What a coincidence, I'm waiting for someone, too."

LABEL: 0x43A9
STRING: She didn't turn her eyes toward me, but I still feel like I'm being stared at...

LABEL: 0x4418
STRING: I was scared by the strange atmosphere she was giving off, and my body was covered in cold sweat.

LABEL: 0x449B
STRING: Why does this girl act like she's stalking Nana?

LABEL: 0x4543
STRING: Don't tell me she's a lesbian? Not just a lesbian, but a psycho lesbian?

LABEL: 0x45BA
STRING: A disturbing word pops into my head, but of course I don't say it out loud.

LABEL: 0x4629
STRING: I had been absentmindedly thinking about that when...

LABEL: 0x4757
STRING: Before I knew it, she was turning my way and smiled at me.

LABEL: 0x4966
STRING: Weren't you supposed to be expressionless...

LABEL: 0x49B5
STRING: Before I knew it, she turned her head towards me and gave me a creepy smile.

LABEL: 0x4AD2
STRING: "What kind of relationship I have... with Nana-senpai?"

LABEL: 0x4BC0
STRING: The moment I heard the word "Nana-senpai", my heart jumped with a thump.

LABEL: 0x4C28
STRING: I knew it, this girl was waiting for...

LIST.STRING: Saiko, you're not waiting for anyone.

LABEL: 0x4D9F
STRING: "You are correct. I'm only here to stall you."

LABEL: 0x4F77
STRING: "Nana-senpai and I are in on this together, you know."

LABEL: 0x5058
STRING: I rolled my eyes, not sure what she meant by that.

LABEL: 0x5167
STRING: "...You still don't get it, do you?"

LABEL: 0x52F0
STRING: "If you're looking for Nana-senpai, she should be in bed with another man right now."

LABEL: 0x54F3
STRING: "You look like you don't know what I'm talking about."

LABEL: 0x5690
STRING: "I'll tell you then, in terms that you can understand."

LABEL: 0x59C8
STRING: "For a long time, she's been asking me for advice on how to get you to leave her peacefully."

LABEL: 0x5B79
STRING: "She said, 'How can I go out with Yukimaru without causing any trouble?'"

LABEL: 0x5D18
STRING: "So I've decided to play the role of the bad guy and tear the two of you apart."

LABEL: 0x5E19
STRING: What the hell is she talking about...?

LABEL: 0x5F18
STRING: "Hehe, sorry to say this, but she said she couldn't be satisfied as yours was too small."

LABEL: 0x60CD
STRING: "It makes me laugh that you didn't know that, even though you've been with her all this time."

LABEL: 0x6207
STRING: You, on what grounds are you making such accusations...

LABEL: 0x6306
STRING: "You still have doubts about it? Well, take a look at this."

LABEL: 0x6414
STRING: She took out her flip-phone and showed me the screen.

LABEL: 0x647B
STRING: A video... No, it looked more like a video call.

LABEL: 0x64D2
STRING: On the screen was a man who looked like Yukimaru... and Nana.

LABEL: 0x6537
STRING: I heard Nana's voice, it was the most excited and sexy voice I've ever heard her utter.

LABEL: 0x6657
STRING: "...How about it? Nana-senpai seems so happy, doesn't she?"

LABEL: 0x67EA
STRING: "You've never seen Nana-senpai in such a state of ecstasy, have you?"

LABEL: 0x68EF
STRING: When I saw those shocking images, I fell to my knees.

LABEL: 0x695C
STRING: My eyes go round and round, and I can't think of anything.

LABEL: 0x6A63
STRING: "You're still not ready as a man... if you let another man sleep with your woman."

LABEL: 0x6C18
STRING: "Yes... I'm confident that I can satisfy Nana-senpai better than this man."

LABEL: 0x6DD3
STRING: "It's easy to make Nana-senpai mine... mentally and sexually."

LABEL: 0x6F84
STRING: "A woman like her will become dependent on you as soon as you get her to put a little trust in you."

LABEL: 0x7133
STRING: "─How does it feel to be humiliated by a lesbian? Hey, tell me."

LABEL: 0x7241
STRING: As my vision blurred from my tears, Saiko's venomous words won't leave my ears.

LABEL: 0x72E5
STRING: Nana's happy screams, coming from the flip-phone, echoed forever...

LABEL: 0x77C4
STRING: "Ever since you showed up, Nana-senpai's become weird..."

LABEL: 0x7A62
STRING: What the hell is this girl talking about...?

LABEL: 0x7B5F
STRING: "I'm just worried about Nana-senpai. I'm just trying to get rid of the pests that are gathering around her."

LABEL: 0x7D30
STRING: "Nana-senpai is my reason for living. She taught me the meaning of life... so, she's like a god to me."

LABEL: 0x7EF9
STRING: "If Nana-senpai is in trouble, only I'll help her."

LABEL: 0x8092
STRING: "I won't forgive you if you make Nana-senpai unhappy."

LABEL: 0x82A3
STRING: "Please don't use words which don't make any sense. You've got to talk to me in a way I can understand."

LABEL: 0x83BE
STRING: The coldness of her voice sent chills down my spine and I couldn't move.

LABEL: 0x8417
STRING: She laughed suspiciously and put her hand on my neck.

LABEL: 0x851E
STRING: "Or are you saying you're... going to fill my hole?"

LABEL: 0x891A
STRING: I pushed Saiko away as hard as I could, grabbed Nana's hand, and ran.

LABEL: 0x897F
STRING: I thought it was a bit violent, but it's the only way to protect Nana right now.

LABEL: 0x89F4
STRING: I've got to protect Nana from Saiko's clutches...

LABEL: 0x8C88
STRING: I heard the sound of dripping water in this black unknown space.

LABEL: 0x8CCF
STRING: Where am I, and why am I here?

LABEL: 0x8D2E
STRING: I, Nana, was supposed to have put on my nightgown, and then went to bed at the usual time.

LABEL: 0x8D99
STRING: I was waist-deep in water, but strangely I wasn't cold.

LABEL: 0x8DFA
STRING: ─I don't understand, what is this? Am I dreaming?

LABEL: 0x8E4F
STRING: I've been having a lot of dreams like this lately.

LABEL: 0x8E9A
STRING: I hope it's a dream, because then, it would be nothing more than a dream. If this was reality, that'd be the worst...

LABEL: 0x8EF7
STRING: While I was lost in thought, I heard the sound of water being pushed aside from up ahead.

LABEL: 0x8F58
STRING: That's right, it always happens at this time...

LABEL: 0x9302
STRING: "I want the truth. I'm not satisfied with the way things are going..."

LABEL: 0x9419
STRING: "What are you talking about? I don't get it."

LABEL: 0x9517
STRING: "Please... Nana-senpai. I would never, ever hurt you."

LABEL: 0x9805
STRING: "It's just a dream anyway... If you can do it, go ahead and try...!!"

LABEL: 0x9A75
STRING: Saiko smiles and happily puts her hand around my neck.

LABEL: 0x9BA9
STRING: Even if it's a lie, I regret saying something like that.

LABEL: 0x9C0C
STRING: I don't like it... It's disgusting. Even in a dream like this, it doesn't feel good.

LABEL: 0x9CF9
STRING: Unintentionally, my true feelings came out of my mouth.

LABEL: 0x9DE1
STRING: "What you're doing is nothing less than stalking me! Do you really enjoy watching me get scared?

LABEL: 0xA040
STRING: "I am you, and you are me."

LABEL: 0xA101
STRING: Saiko's face and body melted into a sludge.

LABEL: 0xA152
STRING: And that liquid clung to my body.

LABEL: 0xA33B
STRING: The liquid is slowly eating away at my body─

LABEL: 0xA38C
STRING: Eventually, me and Saiko became one.

LABEL: 0xA49E
STRING: We were originally one existence in the beginning...

LABEL: 0xA9D6
STRING: "Because you and I are... the same."

LABEL: 0xAB10
STRING: She said that, and then I woke up.

LABEL: 0xAB67
STRING: I'm on my bed, my body is drenched in sweat.

LABEL: 0xACBB
STRING: My body feels disgusting from all the sweat.

LABEL: 0xAD69
STRING: I can hear her voice, that voice that I heard in my dreams just now...

LABEL: 0xADD0
STRING: As if Saiko is right in front of me, a hallucination.

LABEL: 0xAE3F
STRING: "This is just silly, am I starting to... hear things."

LABEL: 0xAE9B
STRING: Have I finally lost my mind?

LABEL: 0xAEF4
STRING: I can't believe that even in the real world, I can't have any respite from these visions...

LABEL: 0xB2DC
STRING: Saiko smiled suspiciously and pushed me down roughly.

LABEL: 0xB3DA
STRING: "Don't come, don't touch me! Don't come near me!"

LABEL: 0xB5E1
STRING: "No...! Enough, already...! I hate you! I really hate you!!! I want nothing to do with you ever again!"

LABEL: 0xB684
STRING: "Disappear! Disappear!! Disappear, disappear, disappear!!!! Get the fuck away from me!!!"

LABEL: 0xB87C
STRING: The hallucination of Saiko turned over dejectedly and disappeared before I knew it.

LABEL: 0xB966
STRING: I wipe the sweat off my face.

LABEL: 0xB9AD
STRING: I can't let my guard down for even a second anymore.

LABEL: 0xB9F8
STRING: I wonder if I'll be able to sleep for one minute... or even one second.

LABEL: 0xBA4B
STRING: Just thinking about the fact that she might be in the house, I feel every muscle in my body tense up.

LABEL: 0xBACE
STRING: I pulled the covers over my head and waited for the morning to come...

LABEL: 0xBDD7
STRING: I'm confused by the unusual white scenery.

LABEL: 0xBE88
STRING: When I calmed down, they moved me to a room with a view.

LABEL: 0xBEF1
STRING: I came out of the dark room and saw sunlight for the first time in a while.

LABEL: 0xBFA9
STRING: The scar on my wrist stings.

LABEL: 0xBFF0
STRING: The marks, still fresh and red, show that the sin I committed is still new.

LABEL: 0xC057
STRING: I went on a bit of a rampage yesterday, so I deserved these wounds.

LABEL: 0xC0B8
STRING: ...They've put me in restraints. It's no surprise, because I can't control my own emotions, and might hurt someone else.

LABEL: 0xC156
STRING: I could say it was business as usual, but the fact that I was getting used to this unusual situation scared me a little.

LABEL: 0xC1D1
STRING: Now that I can't even control my own emotions... how do I look in the eyes of others?

LABEL: 0xC24B
STRING: I wonder what Onee-chan will think if she saw me now, would she laugh at me for being a freak?

LABEL: 0xC2BA
STRING: That's not possible. Onee-chan has never made fun of me, not even once.

LABEL: 0xC32D
STRING: I got scared as I got sucked further into my impossible fantasies.

LABEL: 0xC38E
STRING: It makes me want to shake my head furiously and smash everything around me.

LABEL: 0xC3F7
STRING: It makes me want to boil up from the deepest parts of my heart, and then disappear into a pulpy, soggy mess.

LABEL: 0xC464
STRING: My emotions of anger are welling up, and the desire to kill myself becomes stronger.

LABEL: 0xC534
STRING: I shake my head violently and deny it.

LABEL: 0xC585
STRING: I drove away the fearful thoughts that come up one after another, from my mind.

LABEL: 0xC65E
STRING: From my window, I could see a crimson flower blooming in the garden's pond.

LABEL: 0xC764
STRING: Zakuro, the flower of the pomegranate plant.

LABEL: 0xC79D
STRING: A flower that embodies the opposites of life and death. A dimensional chain that connects this world and the next.

LABEL: 0xC810
STRING: My lips quivered slightly as I looked at it, which had bloomed as if it had forseen my death.

LABEL: 0xC8E9
STRING: However, there's no need to for me to afraid, because I'm not afraid of death.

LABEL: 0xC94C
STRING: Because if I lose my body, then I can see Onee-chan, the person I wanted to see the most.

LABEL: 0xC9CB
STRING: So, the true nature of this trembling must be joy.

LABEL: 0xCAB4
STRING: The moment I've been waiting for for so long is finally about to happen.

LABEL: 0xCB9A
STRING: The moment all the liquid had left my bladder, I let out an exclamation.

LABEL: 0xCF30
STRING: Under the deep blue starry sky.

LABEL: 0xCF71
STRING: A woman illuminated by the twinkling stars was talking with a girl.

LABEL: 0xCFF2
STRING: "Every now and then... I still think about the day Onee-chan turned twenty."

LABEL: 0xD0EE
STRING: "Okay. On that day, Onee-chan, without saying anything to our mother... left our house."

LABEL: 0xD18D
STRING: "Onee-chan said this to me after she had packed her things."

LABEL: 0xD210
STRING: "After today, I won't be coming back to this house. I'm sorry, Saiko..."

LABEL: 0xD29B
STRING: "She said, 'I hate our mother, but I love you, Saiko...'"

LABEL: 0xD38F
STRING: "Those two have always been on bad terms. They give each other the silent treatment every day."

LABEL: 0xD414
STRING: "She wanted to fulfill her dream of becoming a beautician, but mother wouldn't let her."

LABEL: 0xD4C1
STRING: "The tense air of such a house almost crushed me, and I struggled to stay sane."

LABEL: 0xD568
STRING: "Onee-chan was in pain and no one understood it... but I couldn't help her, I couldn't be her strength."

LABEL: 0xD629
STRING: "I was the only one who understood her..."

LABEL: 0xD6A8
STRING: "So maybe that's why she left me. Abandoned me."

LABEL: 0xD73B
STRING: "Don't be so hard on yourself. You've done nothing wrong, Saiko."

LABEL: 0xD839
STRING: "So I've decided to live my life always putting Onee-chan first."

LABEL: 0xD8C8
STRING: "To love Onee-chan from the bottom of my heart is my redemption."

LABEL: 0xD949
STRING: "Don't you think that's fitting for sisters who were starved for parental love?"

LABEL: 0xD9D4
STRING: "Moeko-san... what do you think of me like this? Don't you think I'm pathetic?"

LABEL: 0xDB4B
STRING: "Saiko-chan, there are so many things a child is powerless to help, you know?"

LABEL: 0xDBE2
STRING: "You can't blame yourself for everything. It's inevitable that some things depend on the circumstances you were born into."

LABEL: 0xDC83
STRING: "It may be hard now, but when you're ready to live on your own..."

LABEL: 0xDD1C
STRING: "You will definitely find your true self."

LABEL: 0xDD97
STRING: "It's the start of your real life, where you're not tied down to anyone or anything."

LABEL: 0xDE24
STRING: "But I... can't do it. No matter what I do, no matter how I do it, it just doesn't turn out right."

LABEL: 0xDEC7
STRING: "I have nothing but worries about the future, nothing but regret inside my heart."

LABEL: 0xDF4C
STRING: "No one has ever loved me before, and I'm sure no one ever will."

LABEL: 0xE0C1
STRING: "Hehe. You're just like me with your low self-esteem."

LABEL: 0xE156
STRING: "We might not get along very well, but we're probably very similar people."

LABEL: 0xE1DB
STRING: "We can only walk while embracing the pain."

LABEL: 0xE264
STRING: "Because when the pain is gone... you won't be yourself anymore, will you?"
